content: this very simple and quick pattern will make a fun basketball key chain for the basketball lover in your life maybe that s you using entirely single_crochet worsted weight yarn and a small 2 25mm hook this is the perfect sized ball for a fun key chain you want to clip to your backpack or purse so you don t lose video 1 is provided to help with the sewing of the lines and it s easier than you might think text and images copyright ©2020 by erin greene of ​ ekayg 2 ​ all rights reserved no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form by any method without written permission finished products made from this pattern may be used for sale please credit back to ​ekayg​ please direct any questions about the pattern to my e­mail ​ ekaygcrafts@gmail com​ i will respond as quickly as i am able 1 https //youtu be/umxcqm6giak 2 https //www ekayg com
